```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(xaringanthemer)
library(fontawesome)
options(htmltools.dir.version = FALSE)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  echo = FALSE,
  dev = "png",
  dpi = 150,
  comment = "#>",
  message = FALSE,
  warning = FALSE,
  fig.align = "center"
)

image_iarc_path <- function(.file) {
    fs::path("..", "..", "iarc", "2020-12-16", "images", .file)
}

image_steno_2021_10_path <- function(.file) {
    fs::path("..", "..", "steno", "2021-10-04", "images", .file)
}

fa2 <- function(.icon) {
    fontawesome::fa(name = .icon, fill = "#214c78")
}
```

```{r xaringan-themer, include=FALSE}
style_mono_accent(
    base_color = "#214c78",
    base_font_size = "20px",
    header_font_google = google_font("Monda"),
    text_font_google = google_font("Rosario"),
    header_h3_font_size = "30px",
    extra_css = list(
       ".remark-slide-content" = list("padding-top" = "10px"),
       ".remark-slide-content > h3:first-of-type" = list("margin-top" = "10px")
    )
)
```
